---
title: "Estimating power and statistical significance in multi-variant A/B tests"
output: github_document
---



```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

```
```{r}
baseline = 0.3
within_var = baseline * (1 - baseline)

power.anova.test(groups=2, n=100, within.var = 0.21, power=0.8)

power.prop.test(n=1000, p1=baseline, power=0.8)
```
```{r}
baseline_mean = 0.4
baseline_sd = sqrt(baseline_mean * (1 - baseline_mean))

pp = power.t.test(n=6000, delta=NULL, sd=baseline_sd, power=0.8)

pp
```
```{r}
power.anova.test(groups=2, n=6000, within.var = baseline_sd ** 2, power=0.8)
```
```{r}
var(c(baseline_mean, baseline_mean + pp$delta))
```
